overview:
Josh Withers is a Partner and Co-Founder at True Capital Partners. TCP is a retained executive search firm specialized in working with venture capital and private equity backed technology companies. Prior to TCP Josh was an associate principal in the global Private Equity & Venture Capital Practice at Heidrick & Struggles where he focused on senior level executive searches within all areas of technology.

Prior to joining Heidrick, Josh was a principal consultant with a leading boutique retained executive search firm. In his tenure there, Josh successfully placed numerous senior executives across a broad range of industries and roles including CEO, CFO, COO, CTO, VP of sales, VP of marketing, VP of product management and VP Engineering. His clients range from top-tier venture capital-backed high technology start-ups to large public companies. Prior to that he was a director with another major search firm, and was in that firm’s technology practice.

Josh works primarily out of True Capital Partner’s Silicon Valley office.
